column2: Normal; small ulcerated tumor located on top of head
DCT-TVA; Braf CA; ink/arf f/f; pten f/f
Brain, lungs, heart, liver, kidneys, spleen, tumor
Small, ulcerated tumor on top of head
Heart and Lungs looked fairly healthy upon visual inspection
Skull was in tact, although it did have a lot of blood when skull was cut into
